card.base.challenge.description: You may play this card when another player attemps to play a Hero, Item, or Magic card. CHALLENGE that card.
card.base.cursed-item.curse-of-the-snake: Each time you roll to use the equipped Hero card's effect, -2 to your roll.
card.base.item.bard-mask.description: The equipped Hero card is considered a Bard instead of its original class.
card.base.magic.call-to-the-fallen.descr: Search the discard pile for a Hero card and add it to your hand.
card.base.modifier.minus4.description: Play this card after any player (including you) rolls the dice. -4 to that roll.
card.base.monster.abyss-queen.descriptio: Requirement : any Hero x2 {br}{br} 5 or less : SACRIFICE a Hero card {br}{br} 8 or more : SLAY this Monster {br}{br}{br} Each time another player plays a Modifier card on one of your rolls, +1 to your roll.
card.base.party-leader-bard.the-charisma: {br}{br}{br}{br}{br}{br}{br} Each time you roll to use a Hero card's effect, +1 to your roll.
